Show / Hide Table of Contents

Class PhysicsWorld

The PhysicsWorld provides:

Global values such as Gravity. Connecting PhysicsBodies with the AddJoint(PhysicsJoint) method. Raising events when PhysicsBody begin or end contact with each other(DidBeginContact, DidEndContact).

Inheritance
System.Object
PhysicsWorld
Namespace: Fantas.Physics
Assembly: Fantas.dll
Syntax
public sealed class PhysicsWorld : Object

Property Value
Type Description
System.Numerics.Vector2

Iterations

Number of iterations to be used by impulse solver The default value is 10, for a more precise use a higher value For a faster sover use a lower value (This only affect Chipmunk/MonoGame backend)

Declaration
public int Iterations { get; set; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.Int32

The speed at which the physics simulation runs.
